What you've described is sort of similiar to how Angband generates its levels, but of course
since Angband has to generate claustrophobic dungeons with secret rooms, traps etc etc, it's routines
are rather more sophisticated than what Gladiator would require.

It has predefined "vaults" which are essentially big rooms. AFAIK they're stored in simple
text files.

We could use a similiar approach with Gladiator and refine it as we go along :)

-Niall.
